entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light early this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
